title: What can I do if myY536A1 phone can't properly power on?
answer:
l   If you are using the phone for the first time:

Charge your phone for about half an hour before powering it on. 

When your phone powers on for the first time, the system needs to be initialized, which may take a while. Please wait patiently. 

l   If you just restored your phone to its factory settings or updated it: 

Please wait patiently because the system needs to be initialized, which may take a while. 

If the screen freezes, reinstall the battery and try again.

l   If your phone powers off during normal use and can't power on again:

The battery level may be too low. Charge your phone for a while and try again. 

If the problem persists, contact Huawei technical support or take your phone to an authorized Huawei service center.
